嫧字的基本解释

嫧
zé
整齐。
美好。
善。

嫧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zé］
［《廣韻》側革切，入麥，莊。］
(1)整齐。
(2)年轻美貌。
(3)善良。
[②]［cè］
［《廣韻》楚革切，入麥，初。］
健急貌。

嫧字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　嫧； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页270第09
【廣韻】【集韻】?側革切，音責。【說文】齊也。一曰嫧娕，齊謹也。　又【集韻】七迹切，音皵。義同。　又測革切，音策。【博雅】好也。一曰婩嫧，鮮好貌。或作?。

嫧字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
嫧字的起名意思

暂无。

嫧
Basic explanation of words
嫧
zé
neat.
Beautiful.
good.
嫧
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zé］
["Guangyun" side leather cut, into wheat, Zhuang. ]
(1) Neat.
(2) Young and beautiful.
(3) Kindness.
[②]［cè］
["Guangyun" Chu Geqi, into wheat, early. ]
Anxious appearance.
嫧
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　嫧; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 270 09
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Side leather cut, sound responsibility. [Said Wen] Qi Ye. One said, 嫧娕, Qi Jin also.　[Jiyun] Seven traces cut, sound 皵. The same meaning.　Testing leather cutting again, Otosaku. [Bo Ya] Good too. One said the grandma, she was so good-looking. Or for?.
嫧
